description.value:
You become trained in Performance; if you were already trained in Performance, you instead become trained in a skill of your choice. You also gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Juggle] skill feat, even if you don't meet its prerequisites.

Special You cannot select another dedication feat until you have gained one other feat from the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.journals.JournalEntry.vx5FGEG34AxI2dow.JournalEntryPage.bQeLZt29NnHEn6fh]{Juggler} archetype.

publication.title: Pathfinder #151: The Show Must Go On
